reviews.text: The best things about this facility are the proximity to the slopes, the friendly staff, popcorn in the locker room for boot changing and skis, and enclosed parking.
reviews.title: A bit tired for the price but wonderful location

reviews.text: The minor irritants - finding hot chocolate in my ski boots (the scourge of the locker room), the coffee bar neglected in the afternoons, and the price of the condo.
reviews.title: Great Place and great location

reviews.text: The worst thing is the rooms are a bit tired and the decor is a mish mash of furnishings/decor.
reviews.title: Great Condos in a Great location

reviews.text: Their was a flurry of building activity nearby the condo but it did not interfere with our enjoyment.
reviews.title: Great Place - Tripadvisor member - Rio de Janeiro,Brazil

likes.disliked: — could be a tiny bit nearer to lifts

reviews.title: Great location and staff
reviews.text: We stayed at Montaneros over Labor Day weekend and we just made reservations to go back in 3/07. Montaneros is located in Lionshead, there are great restuarants, bars and ski rental located next to the building. The gondola is only 150 yards away. Once we arrived we never used our vehicle again. Everything is located within walking distance. Vail Village is also a short walk, if you get tired of walking you can hop the bus which will take you back to Montaneros door step. This is our first visit to Montaneros since they remodeld the exterior, it looks very nice. We stayed in unit 208 which looks like it was completely remodeled too. We have booked the same unit for our next trip.
